title: Coping with Quarantine
description:
What’s your process for coping with Covid quarantine? Jillian has some tips! Plus, how to work out in your apartment without disturbing the neighbors. And Dr. Kate Biberdorf is back on the show to tell us about her new “Kate the Chemist” kids’ books, and the science of burning fat.

Guest link: KateTheChemist.com

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
